column4: okay I installed hardy on my fileserver to set it up, now that its all going I dont need the desktop anymore since I administer through ssh. can I uninstall the desktop? :D
Except, get rid of the "install kubuntu-desktop" at the end (and you'll still need to remove some X stuff)
Sorry, I dont want a KDE system, I just want a terminal.
yes, I mentioned you'dneed to remove the install of kubuntu-desktop at the end.
